descript.abstract:
Displays blockfaces for all segments of the street network. Identifies the elements of the block, such as peak hour restrictions, length of the block, parking categories, and restricted parking zones.
| Update Cycle: Weekly | Attribute Information: | Contact Email: DOT_IT_GIS@seattle.gov
--- Parking by Category - Parking attributes at the blockface level for use in the Seattle Parking Map. Attribute: Parking _Category | Alias: Parking Category | Attribute Values: Carpool Parking, Paid Parking, Restricted Parking Zone, Time Limit Parking, No Parking Allowed, Unrestricted Parking --- Restricted Parking Zones(RPZs) - RPZs local shows streets having restricted parking permit parking signs within each zone. RPZs Citywide shows locations of all the Restricted Parking Zones Citywide. Attributes: RPZ_ZONE; RPZ_Area
descript.purpose: Blockfaces in Seattle - includes block elements such as peak hour restrictions, parking categories, and restricted parking zones.

idinfo.useconst:
PDDL | This item is meant for public access and use. The City of Seattle makes no representation or warranty as to its accuracy.
Important | The City of Seattle has created this service for our GIS Open Data website. We do reserve the right to alter, suspend, re-host, or retire this service at any time and without notice. GIS staff will provide notification of changes via the Comments RSS capability in ArcGIS Online.
